text:
Hey Guys,
Do you have any idea that how we can link the 404 and 500 error page. How we can customize error pages.
Do, I need to create the new template for that or need to customize the default error pages on hubspost?
Thank you

Hi, I have no experience with HubSpot at all but our admin department was told that they needed dev help with <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/quotes> I've setup the local dev environment but `hg create template` has no quote option so I'm a bit lost.

Hey there, quote templates are in beta.

The best place to ask questions and provide feedback about the quote template functionality is in the <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Custom-Quote-Template-Beta/gh-p/cpq-beta#|community group for it>.

Documentation for the quotes functionality can be found here:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-from-the-cms-quotes-theme-beta>

More related information can be found at these links:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started-from-the-cms-quotes-theme-beta#related-resources>
